project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement function to read the text file and process the content.
Implement function to count the frequency of each word in the text.
Implement functionality to display the top 10 most common words in the terminal.
Write tests for each of the functions above.
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly.
